languages.text: Вспомнил он, как первые миссионеры ступили ногой своей на пустынный простор Фолстоуна, ведомые желанием служити святому Когнацию. Как благословил их подвижник Никомедас Кифа, странствовавший с ними на звездном челне, основати тут обитель скромную и чистую, пестующую мудрость и набожность.

Prelate Hectarchius recalled the first missionaries to set foot on Foulstone's vast wasteland, led by their zeal for serving Saint Cognatius. And those missionaries had received the blessing of Nicomedes Keefe, the champion of faith who had travelled with them in their star-barque, to found in this place a humble and pure abode wherein to cultivate wisdom and piety.
languages.original_text: Вспомнил он, как первые миссионеры ступили ногой своей на пустынный простор Фолстоуна, ведомые желанием служити святому Когнацию. Как благословил их подвижник Никомедас Кифа, странствовавший с ними на звездном челне, основати тут обитель скромную и чистую, пестующую мудрость и набожность.

traits.locale_text: The memory was refreshed of first missionaries setting foot on Foulstone's vast wasteland, led by their zeal for serving Saint Cognatius. And those missionaries had received the blessing of Nicomedas Cephas, the champion of faith who had travelled in their starboat, to found in this place a humble and pure abode wherein to cultivate wisdom and piety.

And those missionaries had received the blessing of Nicomedas Cephas, the champion of faith who had travelled in their starboat, to found in this place a humble and pure abode wherein to cultivate wisdom and piety.

Prelate Hectarchius recalled the first missionaries to set foot on Foulstone's vast wasteland, led by their zeal for serving Saint Cognatius. And those missionaries had received the blessing of Nicomedas Cephas, the champion of faith who had travelled with them in their star-barque, to found in this place a humble and pure abode wherein to cultivate wisdom and piety.

And those missionaries had received the blessing of Nicomedas Cephas, the champion of faith who had travelled with them in their star-barque, to found in this place a humble and pure abode wherein to cultivate wisdom and piety.

Prelate Hectarchius recalled the first missionaries to set foot on Foulstone's vast wasteland, led by their zeal for serving Saint Cognatius. And those missionaries had received the blessing of Nicomedes Keefe, the champion of faith who had travelled with them in their star-barque, to found in this place a humble and pure abode wherein to cultivate wisdom and piety.

languages.text: El prelado Hectarchius ordenó el regreso de los primeros misioneros que habían puesto pie en los eriales de Rocainmunda, guiados por su fervor hacia san Cognatius. Esos misioneros habían recibido la bendición de Nicomedes Keefe, el campeón de la fe con quien habían realizado su travesía en la barca estelar, para fundar un lugar humilde y puro en el que cultivar su sabiduría y piedad.
languages.original_text: Prelate Hectarchius recalled the first missionaries to set foot on Foulstone's vast wasteland, led by their zeal for serving Saint Cognatius. And those missionaries had received the blessing of Nicomedes Keefe, the champion of faith who had travelled with them in their star-barque, to found in this place a humble and pure abode wherein to cultivate wisdom and piety.

traits.locale_text: El prelado Hectarchius ordenó el regreso de los primeros misioneros que habían puesto pie en los eriales de Rocainmunda, guiados por su fervor hacia san Cognatius. Esos misioneros habían recibido la bendición de Nicomedes Keefe, el campeón de la fe con quien habían realizado su travesía en la barca estelar, para fundar un lugar humilde y puro en el que cultivar su sabiduría y piedad.

languages.text: 赫克塔奇乌斯教长回想起了第一批踏上荒寂岩地的传教士。那些人充满了侍奉圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的狂热，而且得到了尼科梅迪斯·基弗的祝福。这位忠诚的信徒曾乘坐星舰，与传教士们同行，并且在这个地方建立了一座谦卑而纯洁的居所，教化智慧与虔诚。
languages.original_text: Prelate Hectarchius recalled the first missionaries to set foot on Foulstone's vast wasteland, led by their zeal for serving Saint Cognatius. And those missionaries had received the blessing of Nicomedes Keefe, the champion of faith who had travelled with them in their star-barque, to found in this place a humble and pure abode wherein to cultivate wisdom and piety.

traits.locale_text: 赫克塔奇乌斯教长回想起了第一批踏上荒寂岩地的传教士。那些人充满了侍奉圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的狂热，而且得到了尼科梅迪斯·基弗的祝福。这位忠诚的信徒曾乘坐星舰，与传教士们同行，并且在这个地方建立了一座谦卑而纯洁的居所，教化智慧与虔诚。

languages.text: 上級聖職者ヘクターキウスは、聖コグナティウスへの奉仕に燃える心に突き動かされて、ファウルストーンの広大な荒野に足を踏み入れた、最初の宣教師達のことを思い出していた。その宣教師達は、星間帆船で共に旅をした信仰の第一人者ニコメデス・キーフの祝福を受けて、この地に慎ましく汚れなき住処を見つけ、ここで知恵と信仰心を育むことに決めた者達だ。
languages.original_text: Prelate Hectarchius recalled the first missionaries to set foot on Foulstone's vast wasteland, led by their zeal for serving Saint Cognatius. And those missionaries had received the blessing of Nicomedes Keefe, the champion of faith who had travelled with them in their star-barque, to found in this place a humble and pure abode wherein to cultivate wisdom and piety.

traits.locale_text: 上級聖職者ヘクターキウスは、聖セファスへの奉仕に燃える心に突き動かされて、ファウルストーンの広大な荒野に足を踏み入れた、最初の宣教師達のことを思い出していた。その宣教師達は、星間帆船で共に旅をした信仰の第一人者ニコメデス・キーフの祝福を受けて、この地に慎ましく汚れなき住処を見つけ、ここで知恵と信仰心を育むことに決めた者達だ。

languages.text: Prälat Hectarchius gedachte der ersten Missionare, die Foulstones endloses Ödland im Namen von St. Cognatius betreten hatten. Und eben diese Missionare hatten den Segen von Nicomedes Keefe, dem Champion des Glaubens, erhalten, der sie auf ihrer Sternbarke begleitet hatte, um an diesem Ort eine demütige und reine Bleibe zur Förderung von Frömmigkeit und Weisheit zu gründen.
languages.original_text: Prelate Hectarchius recalled the first missionaries to set foot on Foulstone's vast wasteland, led by their zeal for serving Saint Cognatius. And those missionaries had received the blessing of Nicomedes Keefe, the champion of faith who had travelled with them in their star-barque, to found in this place a humble and pure abode wherein to cultivate wisdom and piety.

traits.locale_text: Prälat Hectarchius gedachte der ersten Missionare, die Foulstones endloses Ödland im Namen von St. Cognatius betreten hatten. Und eben diese Missionare hatten den Segen von Nicodemes Keefe, dem Champion des Glaubens, erhalten, der sie auf ihrer Sternbarke begleitet hatte, um an diesem Ort eine demütige und reine Bleibe zur Förderung von Frömmigkeit und Weisheit zu gründen.

languages.text: Le prélat Hectarchius se rappelle soudain les premiers missionnaires qui ont posé le pied sur les vastes étendues désolées de Rochepeste, guidés par leur dévotion envers Saint Cognatius. Ces pionniers avaient reçu la bénédiction de Nicomède Keefe, le champion de la foi qui les accompagnait dans leur barge stellaire, pour fonder en ce lieu une humble et pure demeure consacrée à la sagesse et à la piété.
languages.original_text: Prelate Hectarchius recalled the first missionaries to set foot on Foulstone's vast wasteland, led by their zeal for serving Saint Cognatius. And those missionaries had received the blessing of Nicomedes Keefe, the champion of faith who had travelled with them in their star-barque, to found in this place a humble and pure abode wherein to cultivate wisdom and piety.

traits.locale_text: Le prélat Hectarchius se rappelle soudain les premiers missionnaires qui ont posé le pied sur les vastes étendues désolées de Rochepeste, guidés par leur dévotion envers Saint Cognatius. Ces pionniers avaient reçu la bénédiction de Nicomède Keefe, le champion de la foi qui les accompagnait dans leur barge stellaire, pour fonder en ce lieu une humble et pure demeure consacrée à la sagesse et à la piété.

languages.text: Piskopos Hectarchius, Aziz Cognatius'a hizmet etmenin gururunu taşıyan ilk misyonerlerin Menfurtaş'a ilk ayak basışını hatırladı. Bu misyonerler, yıldız barkalarında onlarla birlikte seyahat eden din savaşçısı Nicomedes Keefe'nin kutsamasına nail olmuş ve bu sayede buraya irfan ve inanç aşılayacak, mütevazı ve saf bir yuva kurmuşlardı.
languages.original_text: Prelate Hectarchius recalled the first missionaries to set foot on Foulstone's vast wasteland, led by their zeal for serving Saint Cognatius. And those missionaries had received the blessing of Nicomedes Keefe, the champion of faith who had travelled with them in their star-barque, to found in this place a humble and pure abode wherein to cultivate wisdom and piety.

traits.locale_text: Piskopos Hectarchius, Aziz Cognatius'a hizmet etmenin gururunu taşıyan ilk misyonerlerin Menfurtaş'a ilk ayak basışını hatırladı. Bu misyonerler, yıldız barkalarında onlarla birlikte seyahat eden din savaşçısı Nicomedes Keefe'nin kutsamasına nail olmuş ve bu sayede buraya bir irfan ve inanç kaynağı hâline gelecek, mütevazı ve saf bir yuva kurmuşlardı.
